author: cnbc.com
title: Marathon Oil Corporation Declares First Quarter 2018 Dividend
text:
HOUSTON, April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Marathon Oil Corporation (NYSE: MRO) announced today that the Company's board of directors has declared a dividend of 5 cents per share on Marathon Oil Corporation common stock. The dividend is payable on June 11, 2018, to stockholders of record on May 16, 2018.
For more information on Marathon Oil Corporation, visit the Company's website at https://www.marathonoil.com .
Media Relations Contact: Lee Warren: 713-296-4103 Investor Relations Contacts: Zach Dailey: 713-296-4140 John Reid: 713-296-4380
Source:Marathon Oil Corporation
